Title: Elevates killing a police work dog or police work horse from being a class E felony to a class D felony
Summary: Elevates the offense of killing a police work dog or police work horse from being a class E felony to a class D felony; establishes the class E felony of injuring a police work dog or police work horse for intentionally causing serious physical injury to a police work dog or police work horse while such dog or horse is performing its duties under the supervision of a police officer.
LawCode: Amd ยง195.06-a, add ยง195.06-b, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to elevating the severity of the felony offense of killing a police work dog or police work horse and establishing the class E felony offense of injuring a police work dog or police work horse
